[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 Army token if you don’t control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on a Army you control.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control attacks Figments of the Muktann, create a token that’s a copy of that creature that’s tapped and attacking the player protecting Figments of the Muktann. Sacrifice the token at the beginning of the next end step.
